entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 03:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
